fields.name: Ocean View Standard
fields.description: Wake up to breathtaking ocean views in our cozy standard room. Featuring a plush king-size bed, modern bathroom, and a private balcony overlooking the turquoise waters of Adel Beach.

fields.name: Deluxe Beachfront
fields.description: Experience the ultimate beach getaway in our deluxe beachfront room. Step directly onto the sand from your private terrace, enjoy premium amenities, and indulge in panoramic sea views.

fields.name: Family Suite
fields.description: Perfect for families, our spacious suite offers separate sleeping areas, a living room, and all the comforts of home. Kids will love the beach access and the pool views.

fields.name: Honeymoon Villa
fields.description: An intimate and luxurious private villa perfect for couples. Featuring a private plunge pool, outdoor shower, curated romantic decor, and direct beach access. The ultimate romantic escape.

fields.name: Beach Bungalow
fields.description: A charming standalone bungalow nestled in our tropical gardens. Enjoy the privacy of your own space with a hammock porch, outdoor shower, and a 2-minute stroll to the beach.

fields.name: Presidential Suite
fields.description: The pinnacle of luxury at Adel Beach Resort. This sprawling suite offers multiple rooms, a private infinity pool, dedicated butler service, and unrivaled 270-degree ocean views.
